meanings.sent1: The two friends intercommunicate through text messages every day.
meanings.sent2: The team members intercommunicate effectively during meetings to ensure everyone is on the same page.
meanings.sent3: The cats intercommunicate by meowing back and forth, as if having a conversation.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the tree intercommunicate with each other through the underground root system.
meanings.sent5: The neurons in the brain intercommunicate at lightning speed to process information.

meanings.definition: To exchange communication with one another.
meanings.sent1: The students intercommunicate by passing notes in class.
meanings.sent2: The neighboring countries intercommunicate through diplomatic channels to maintain peace.
meanings.sent3: The birds intercommunicate by singing different melodies to attract mates.
meanings.sent4: The devices intercommunicate seamlessly over the Wi-Fi network.
meanings.sent5: The cells in the body intercommunicate to coordinate various functions and maintain homeostasis.
